artist: Delineator: Charles Eisen; Engraver: René Galliard; Publisher: Charles Antoine Jombert
description: bust length portrait of man facing left and looking right; wearing a flat white lace edged collar; in an oval on a pedestal with a painting of the Virgin on the left and 2 paintings on the right
inscription:

title: Portrait of Gaspard Netscher
